import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import './../css/ComprarPlantas.css'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import ic_cuadricula from './../imgs/ic_cuadricula.png' import ic_menu_lateral from './../imgs/ic_menu_lateral.png' import ic_ojo from './../imgs/ic_ojo.png' import ic_carrito_compras from './../imgs/ic_carrito_compras.png' import planta_compromiso from './../imgs/plantas4.webp' import Navbar from './NavBar'; import Fotter from './Fotter'; function ComprarPlantas() { const [minVal, setMinVal] = useState(0); const [maxVal, setMaxVal] = useState(500); const priceGap = 1; const rangeInputMin = useRef(); const rangeInputMax = useRef(); const range = useRef(); useEffect(() => { range.current.style.left = ((minVal / rangeInputMin.current.max) * 100) + "%"; range.current.style.right = 100 - ((maxVal / rangeInputMax.current.max) * 100) + "%"; const shownEventListener = () => { myInputRef.current.focus(); }; myModalRef.current.addEventListener('shown.bs.modal', shownEventListener); return () => { myModalRef.current.removeEventListener('shown.bs.modal', shownEventListener); }; }, [minVal, maxVal]); const handleMinChange = (e) => { let val = parseInt(e.target.value); if ((maxVal - val) < priceGap) { val = maxVal - priceGap; } setMinVal(val); }; const handleMaxChange = (e) => { let val = parseInt(e.target.value); if ((val - minVal) < priceGap) { val = minVal + priceGap; } setMaxVal(val); }; return (

); } export default ComprarPlantas;
